What happens to the VRSCTEST coins I send on the testnet?
All testnet coins/currencies have no value and will disappear whenever VRSCTEST is reset. So, the VRSCTEST coins you send on the testnet will eventually disappear when the testnet is reset.

#### Sending and Converting Currency
**Warning: All testnet coins/currencies have no value and will disappear whenever VRSCTEST is reset**The `sendcurrency` API can be used to send and convert funds.
- **Sending VRSCTEST from a single address (bob@) to a single recipient (alice@):**
```
verus -chain=VRSCTEST sendcurrency "bob@" '[{"currency":"vrsctest","address":"alice@","amount":10}]'
```
- **Sending VRSCTEST from all private wallet funds to two recipients with friendly-name z-addresses (alice@:private and bob@:private):**
```
verus -chain=VRSCTEST sendcurrency "*Z" '[{"currency":"vrsctest","address":"alice@:private","amount":10},{"currency":"VRSCTEST","address":"bob@:private","amount":
Can I use the `sendcurrency` API to send VRSCTEST from a single address to multiple recipients on the mainnet?

The `sendcurrency` API is used on the testnet, not the mainnet. On the testnet, you can send VRSCTEST from a single address to multiple recipients. However, the example provided only shows sending to two recipients with friendly-name z-addresses (alice@:private and bob@:private) on the testnet, not on the mainnet.

#### Sending and Converting Currency
**Warning: All testnet coins/currencies have no value and will disappear whenever VRSCTEST is reset**The `sendcurrency` API can be used to send and convert funds.
```

verus -chain=VRSCTEST sendcurrency "bob@" '[{"currency":"vrsctest","address":"alice@","amount":10}]'
```
- **Sending VRSCTEST from all private wallet funds to two recipients with friendly-name z-addresses (alice@:private and bob@:private):**
```
verus -chain=VRSCTEST sendcurrency "*Z" '[{"currency":"vrsctest","address":"alice@:private","amount":10},{"currency":"VRSCTEST","address":"bob@:private","amount":
